advancedchatmacros.config.general.info.k:
Chat messages would be processed through Konstruct.
https://darkkronicle.github.io/Konstruct
advancedchatmacros.config.general.info.p:
If the raw sent message would trigger the result again,
the message is stopped from sending.
advancedchatmacros.info.matchprocessor: Sends a chat message. Can have a delay and be a command
advancedchatmacros.matchprocessor.info.c:
What message would be sent in chat. {input} is the original message.
This is formatted using Konstruct.
https://darkkronicle.github.io/Konstruct
advancedchatmacros.matchprocessor.info.d: Delay in ticks it takes the message to send.
